title: This Might Give You Faster Internet
description: *0_0* ----- Today's Mystery Video -  ----- *0_0*  eero Home WiFi System -   This is the eero Home WiFi system. It claims to blanket your home in WiFi. Systems like this have previously been more complicated. This one on the other hand has incredibly easy setup. Your grandma could probably do it! You can set up the eero using either Android or iOS.  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
